abstract: So-called Seasonnaires, summertime brand ambassadors for British clothing company Jack Wills, travel to Nantucket Island to promote collegiate brand and its lifestyle.

headline.main: They Get Paid to Have a Catalog-Perfect Summer

snippet: Tough job, but someone’s got to do it: A clothing brand’s marketing campaign means sunset dinners on the beach, dancing into the wee hours and endless drinks....
lead_paragraph: Tough job, but someone’s got to do it: A clothing brand’s marketing campaign means sunset dinners on the beach, dancing into the wee hours and endless drinks.
